item.title: First steps in deep learning with Keras
item.description:
Description

#8 PyData Warsaw

Here are is my Jupyter Notebook on Keras: https://gist.github.com/stared/7de2908b9bcba01c39ee3c591875a23c

I hope I inspired some of you to start learning deep learning, or to hone your DL skills! :)

If you have any questions, I am happy to answer (just drop me an email, contacts here: http://p.migdal.pl).
